name: Percentage preservation
source: The system achieved 99.5% uptime last month.
expected: حقق النظام وقت تشغيل بنسبة 99.5% الشهر الماضي.

name: Multiple numbers
source: The project has 150 contributors and 2500 stars on GitHub.
expected: يضم المشروع 150 مساهماً و2500 نجمة على GitHub.

name: Large numbers with units
source: The company processed 5.2M transactions worth $1.5B last year.
expected: عالجت الشركة 5.2M معاملة بقيمة $1.5B العام الماضي.

name: Date preservation
source: The event is scheduled for 2024-03-15 at 14:00.
